name: Murderous Command
text: You give the target a mental urge to kill its nearest ally, which it obeys to the best of its ability. The target attacks its nearest ally on its next turn with a melee weapon or natural weapon. If necessary, it moves to or charges to the nearest ally in order to make this attack. If it is unable to reach its closest ally on its next turn, the target uses its turn to get as close as possible to the ally.
mythicText:
This spell lasts for a number of rounds equal to your tier. Each round after the first, the target can attempt a new saving throw at the beginning of its turn to break free of the spell.

Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target attacks its nearest ally with its most powerful spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability. If it has no such ability, it attacks the ally with a melee weapon or natural weapon as normal and gains a +4 morale bonus on the attack and damage rolls.
text_zh:
你使目标产生了一种想要杀死身边最近的盟友的强烈冲动，目标必须在力所能及的范围内服从它。

目标在下次行动时会使用近战武器或天生武器攻击最近的盟友。如果有必要，它将会移动或冲锋到盟友身边以完成这次攻击。

如果目标在下次行动时够不到最近的盟友，那么它将会在这轮中尽可能的靠近这个盟友。
mythicText_zh:
该法术持续的轮数等同于你的阶层。在第一轮之后的每一轮，目标都能够在他的回合开始时尝试一次新的豁免来摆脱法术的影响。

强化：若你花费2次神话之力，目标就会使用它最强大的法术、类法术能力或者超自然能力攻击他最靠近的盟友。若他不具有这些能力，则会如常使用近战攻击或者天生武器攻击盟友，不过会在攻击与伤害检定中获得+4士气加值。
